Class DoubleQuadraticEquation

  • java.lang.Object
    • quadraticequation.AbstractQuadraticEquation<java.lang.Double>
      • quadraticequation.DoubleQuadraticEquation

  • public class DoubleQuadraticEquation
extends AbstractQuadraticEquation<java.lang.Double>
    Class that represents quadratic equation with complex coefficients
